text: John Hoyer Updike (March 18, 1932 - January 27, 2009) was an American author of works including Rabbit, Run and Couples. He was born in Reading, Pennsylvania. He died of lung cancer in Danvers, Massachusetts in January 2009. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2009 deaths Category:American Christians Category:American novelists Category:American poets Category:Cancer deaths in Massachusetts Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Writers from Pennsylvania Category:O. Henry Award winners
title: John Updike
